name: Post-Webinar: Convert Live to On-Demand
description: Complete workflow for converting a live webinar recording into an on-demand asset with email automation

defaultVariables.label: Webinar Title
defaultVariables.description: Full title of the webinar (e.g., NetBox Cloud - Now What?)

defaultVariables.label: Zoom Recording URL
defaultVariables.description: Link to download the Zoom recording

defaultVariables.label: YouTube Video ID
defaultVariables.description: Once uploaded, the YouTube video ID

defaultVariables.label: Slides Upload URL
defaultVariables.description: Final URL where slides are hosted

defaultVariables.label: HubSpot Form ID
defaultVariables.description: Form submission ID for tracking registrants

steps.title: üì• Download Zoom Replay
steps.description: Get the webinar recording from Zoom cloud storage. Navigate to Zoom > Recordings and download both the video file and chat transcript (if available).

steps.title: ‚úÇÔ∏è Edit Video in Descript
steps.description:
Clean up the recording:
‚Ä¢ Remove dead air at start/end
‚Ä¢ Cut out any technical issues
‚Ä¢ Add intro/outro if applicable
‚Ä¢ Alternatively: Use Preview app for basic trimming if no extensive editing needed
‚Ä¢ Export final video in MP4 format (1080p recommended)

steps.title: üì∫ Upload to YouTube
steps.description:
Upload the edited video to YouTube:
‚Ä¢ Reference previous webinar videos for consistent formatting
‚Ä¢ Title format: {{webinar_title}} - [Date: {{webinar_date}}]
‚Ä¢ Add description with key takeaways
‚Ä¢ Add relevant tags and set visibility to Unlisted or Public
‚Ä¢ Save the YouTube URL/Video ID: {{youtube_video_id}}

steps.title: üìä Upload Presentation Slides
steps.description:
Upload webinar slides to CMS:
‚Ä¢ Go to: https://netboxlabscms.kinsta.cloud/wp-admin/upload.php
‚Ä¢ Upload the slide deck (PDF format preferred)
‚Ä¢ Copy the final URL
‚Ä¢ Update variable: {{slides_url}}

steps.title: üìß Send Replay Email to Registrants
ü§ñ Set Up On-Demand Autoresponder
steps.description:
Configure HubSpot workflow for future registrants:
‚Ä¢ Clone the autoresponder email template
‚Ä¢ Update subject line with webinar title: {{webinar_title}}
‚Ä¢ Update email body with video and slides links
‚Ä¢ Add the 'On-Demand' brand/tag to email

steps.title: üå≥ Create HubSpot Workflow Branch
steps.description:
Set up workflow logic in HubSpot:
‚Ä¢ Form trigger: 'Has filled out {{hubspot_form_id}}'
‚Ä¢ Branch 1: If webinar date is PAST ‚Üí Send On-Demand email
‚Ä¢ Branch 2: If webinar date is FUTURE ‚Üí Add to Zoom webinar
‚Ä¢ Add re-enrollment rules if needed

steps.title: ‚úÖ Test the On-Demand Flow
steps.description:
Quality check the complete setup:
‚Ä¢ Submit a test registration using a test email
‚Ä¢ Verify on-demand email is received
‚Ä¢ Check all links work (YouTube, slides)
‚Ä¢ Confirm email formatting looks correct
‚Ä¢ Test on mobile and desktop views

steps.title: üìà Update Webinar Status & Archive
steps.description:
Final housekeeping:
‚Ä¢ Mark webinar as 'Completed' in your tracking system
‚Ä¢ Document the YouTube URL in your content library
‚Ä¢ Archive the Zoom recording (optional)
‚Ä¢ Update your webinar calendar/schedule
‚Ä¢ Note: Last checked {{webinar_date}}
